description: 学习现在完成时的基本用法：表示过去发生的动作对现在造成的影响或结果

explanation.basic_structure: 主语 + have/has + 过去分词 + ...
basic_rules: 现在完成时表示过去发生的动作对现在造成的影响或结果
第一人称单数用have，第三人称单数用has
过去分词分为规则变化和不规则变化
常与already, yet, just, ever, never等时间副词连用
usage_cases: 表示过去发生对现在的影响：I have finished my homework. (作业写完了，现在可以玩了)
表示经历：I have been to Beijing. (我去过北京，有这个经历)
表示结果：She has lost her keys. (她丢了钥匙，现在没有钥匙)
common_errors: I have went to Beijing. (错误) → I have gone to Beijing. (正确)
She has went to school. (错误) → She has gone to school. (正确)
I have finish my homework. (错误) → I have finished my homework. (正确)
usage_tips: 现在完成时表示过去对现在的影响
常与already, yet, just等副词连用

basic_usage: I have already finished my homework.
with_adverbs: I have already finished my homework.
She hasn't seen this movie yet.
Have you ever been to Japan?
I have never seen such a beautiful sunset.
sentences: I have already finished my homework.

learning_objectives: 掌握现在完成时的基本用法
能够正确使用have/has + 过去分词

assessment_criteria.needs_improvement: 对现在完成时基本用法不熟悉，需要重新学习
